news_insight_text_link.news_insight_description: Energy Source, based in São João da Boa Vista, São Paulo, Brazil, received a $1.2 million investment from InMotion Ventures. The startup focuses on solutions for the repair, reuse, and recycling of lithium batteries.

properties.growth_insight_description: Energy Source may be growing as indicated by several reports highlighting the expansion of renewable energy, which is relevant to the company's operations in the CleanTech and Energy sectors. One article notes that solar was the fastest growing source of electricity in the US, suggesting a favorable market for Energy Source's solutions. Another report states that solar power set records in 2023, further implying a robust demand for the type of energy solutions provided by Energy Source. Additionally, a significant increase in residential solar installations was reported, breaking records in the third quarter, which could correlate with increased business for companies like Energy Source that operate in the energy efficiency and sustainability industries.

about_short_description.short_description: Energy Source provides comprehensive energy solutions for commercial, industrial, hospitality, municipal, retail, and healthcare sectors.

product.name: EV Charging Solutions
product.description: Provides end-to-end electric vehicle charging solutions, including audits and installations, to support the transition to electric mobility.

product.name: Efficiency Solutions
product.description: Offers a range of services to improve energy efficiency, such as insulation, air sealing, heat pumps, and building management systems.

product.name: Electrification Solutions
product.description: Delivers comprehensive electrification services, from energy audits to installations, to help businesses transition to greener energy sources.

product.name: Construction Services
product.description: Manages construction projects, acting as general contractor or owner's representative, to ensure projects are completed on time and within budget.
